title: 50. Renee Rouleau | "If You Don't Ask, You Don't Get" | 9 Skin Types, Curating a Product Line + Becoming a Celebrity Esthetician
description:
Thank you to the sponsors of our podcast!

Check out our favorite intermittent fasting tool: Fastic App. You can download the app for free on Apple App Store or Google Play.

Explore sponsorship opportunities with Podcorn and start monetizing your podcast by signing up here: https://podcorn.com/podcasters/

Hi Roomies!! We are PUMPED for this episode with absolutely skincare LEGEND Renee Rouleau!! As you might know, Renee is a celebrity esthetician and a product formulating genius. In this episode she shares with us her journey into the skincare world and how she transitioned from a treatment room in Boston to a traveling esthetician for her celebrity clients while running a global skincare product company. Talking to Renee was a dream come true for us and we hope you enjoy this episode as much as we do!

Find Renee:

@reneerouleau @reneerouleauskincare wwww.reneerouleau.com (read her blog! it is phenomenal)

Skin Type Quiz

Why Acne Spot Treatments Don't Work - Renee Blog

Is Wearing Foundation Every Day Bad For Your Skin? - Renee Blog

Renee's Most Popular Blog Posts


Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa.dermaplus

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd
